name: Quick and Easy Burrito Casserole
author: Kayla Brown
summary: Simple and easy burrito dish with lots of flavor that my kiddos LOVE. If I have a busy schedule and not a lot of time to whip up a hearty meal, this recipe is my go to! Enjoy! Serve with sour cream and hot sauce.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained  (Optional)
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Add   and water; cook and stir until meat is coated, about 5 minutes more
Add enchilada sauce, refried beans, and corn; stir to combine
Place a layer of tortilla strips in the bottom of a baking dish
Top with a layer of meat mixture, more tortilla strips, and Mexican cheese; repeat layers as necessary
End with a layer of Mexican cheese
Bake in the oven until cheese is melted and golden, 8 to 10 minutes
